Text.valUnicode: Fill the XML file with data from the SQL Address Book.
Displays the raw XML internal data.

ExpSyntax.val: 'XM14: How Do I Handle XML Data that is Base Encoded?'

Text.val: When the Add Contact button is pressed, the program is switched to Modify
mode and then to Create Line. The alternative would be to have a separate program
to do more detailed data entry.
Normally, when a record is deleted, the subrecords also need to be deleted
However, in XML documents, this is handled automatically by Magic.
Only RTF Blobs are handled here. The Blob itself could hold an image instead, or a Word document,
Here is the RTF. It is up to the programmer to make sure it is displayed in the correct Control,
but beyond that, Magic will handle the translation.
If this record was modified, go back to query mode
